name: nidza
description: Add webgl context GLSL Nidza3DIndentity, New Matix component .Option for attaching click/move for (mobile and desktop) event. Make uniq custom events names, preparing for multi nidza instancing. canvas2d engine explicit only for generating textures , animations, images (on web page), animation , visual effect etc. Objective is low CPU usage price.
author: Nikola Lukic
